project_context.description: A monthly organization app with gender-adaptive theming and natural language processing.
project_context.target_audience: General public seeking organization, specifically women for cycle tracking.
project_context.design_vibe: Soft Minimalism, Pastel & Soft Archetype, Rounded Geometries.

usage_rules: Headings (H1-H3) must use Nunito with tight tracking (-0.02em).
Body text must use Manrope for high legibility.
Use 'font-light' for large display text to feel elegant and airy.

male.description: Warm Blue Tones - Calming, Stable, Trustworthy.

female.description: Fresh Pink Tones - Nurturing, Soft, Vital.

neutral.description: Warm Neutral/White - Clean, Minimal, Blank Canvas.

gradients.usage: Subtle, pastel gradients only. No harsh transitions.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous (2x standard). Use p-6, p-8, p-12.
layout_strategy.container_style: Rounded corners (rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl), soft borders.

buttons.shadow: Shadow-sm on default, Shadow-md on hover.

cards.style: Flat with subtle border OR Soft Shadow. No heavy elevation.

calendar.style: Central visual element. Large, airy cells.
calendar.events: Small colored dots or pill labels within cells.

cycle_tracker.colors: Use theme accent colors for fertility/period phases.

notification_bubble.style: Floating element or Badge on bell icon.

landing_hero.usage: Hero section background or side image

abstract_bg_1.usage: Subtle background texture or card decoration

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a ThemeProvider that switches CSS variables based on user selection (male, female, neutral).
Use the provided color palettes to override Tailwind's base colors in the CSS variables.
Ensure the 'Add Event' modal features a large text area for natural language input.
The Cycle Tracker must be hidden for 'Male' and 'Other' users.
Do not use default Shadcn styling; override radius and shadows to match the 'Soft' aesthetic.
For the 'Female' theme, ensure the cycle tracker is prominent in the dashboard.
Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard layout: Calendar (large), Todo List (tall), Quick Add (small).
universal_guidelines: No 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, robot emojis).
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met even with pastel colors.
